data.title: Summer Art Club: creative with the garden
data.short_description: Did you know that the Van Abbemuseum has a beautiful garden? Let yourself be inspired by everything that grows, blooms, and is built. During this workshop, you'll get a tour of the museum garden, work with plant-based paints, and discover hidden stories of the building and its surroundings!

data.title: Stage Cocktail Comedy Nights
data.short_description: Every second Thursday of the month, Stage Music Café turns into the liveliest comedy club on Stratumseind. Sip on delicious cocktails at sweet prices while enjoying a night full of laughs. Best of all? It’s free to get in—just make sure to book your seat!

data.title: Brabants Verbond
data.short_description: Brabants Verbond is back at the Karpendonkse Plas this summer. On Saturday, 12 July, a colorful house-Valhalla will rise where dancing is required!

data.title: Funki in the park
data.short_description: Be sure to mark Saturday, 12 July, on your calendar for the highly anticipated edition of Funki Bizniz in the park. Grab your tickets while they're hot!

data.title: Flea Market Gerardusplein
data.short_description: The flea market at Gerardusplein takes place on Sunday, July 13, from 10:00 to 17:00. Score a book, dishware, or vintage items at one of the many stalls. Perhaps your treasure trove is waiting for you!

data.title: Unforgettable Van Abbe
data.short_description: A tour through the Van Abbemuseum for people with Alzheimer. Looking at art stimulates the brain, triggers memory, and helps create even more precious memories. Every second Monday of the month!

data.title: Summer Art Club: creative with the garden
data.short_description: Did you know that the Van Abbemuseum has a beautiful garden? Let yourself be inspired by everything that grows, blooms, and is built. During this workshop, you'll get a tour of the museum garden, work with plant-based paints, and discover hidden stories of the building and its surroundings!

data.title: Losse Eindjes
data.short_description: Discover creative connections during Losse Eindjes, an open podium for spoken word that comes to life every two months in the creative hub of Kelderman and Van Noort.

data.title: Rock 'n Roll Meeting Eindhoven (Pre-Party)
data.short_description: Get in the mood for the Rock 'n Roll Meeting Eindhoven Pre-Party! Let loose on Friday, July 18th with a fantastic lineup featuring the Tennessee Drifters and DJ Gary Vintage.

data.title: Pastinaak
data.short_description: On Saturday, 19 July, a brand new edition of Pastinaak is happening at KEVN! Expect irresistible house beats that are guaranteed to get you on the dance floor. Grab your tickets now!

data.title: Rock 'n Roll Meeting Eindhoven
data.short_description: Mark your calendars for the annual Rock 'n Roll Meeting on July 19th! Discover the bustling market, impressive car and motorcycle show, and an array of international artists.

data.title: Tasty Folk
data.short_description: On July 19, Tasty Folk returns with an open-air edition at Club Symbiose in Eindhoven. One stage, five artists, and a vibrant dance floor — just you, the music, and each other. Expect deep, sexy, and danceable house with acts like Dam Swindle. Get your tickets!

data.title: Friends Of The Court
data.short_description: The outdoor day tournament at Peakz starts on Saturday, July 19! Gather your friends, form a team, and play short matches of about 30 minutes. Enjoy non-stop house music and refreshing drinks.

data.title: FeelGood Market
data.short_description: The FeelGood Market is a vibrant market full of design, fashion, vintage, delicious food and much more. Every third Sunday of the month at Strijp-S!

data.title: Summer Art Club: creative with the garden
data.short_description: Did you know that the Van Abbemuseum has a beautiful garden? Let yourself be inspired by everything that grows, blooms, and is built. During this workshop, you'll get a tour of the museum garden, work with plant-based paints, and discover hidden stories of the building and its surroundings!

data.title: Funky Vinyl Fair
data.short_description: A music lover's and vinyl freak's paradise: the Funky Vinyl Fair at Biergarten! From funk and soul to jazz and hip-hop, snag rare best-sellers while live music thrills your ears. Don't miss out!

data.title: PSV Fanday 2025
data.short_description: Come to the PSV Fanday on Saturday, July 26th! Get ready to enjoy various sports-related activities at the Philips Stadium and meet your favorite player. Don't miss the PSV versus Athletic Club match later that day.

data.title: Vintage Kilo Club
data.short_description: Ready to go on a thrifting adventure? Don’t miss out on the Vintage Kilo Club at The Social Hub Eindhoven!

data.title: Effenaar ’t Wasven
data.short_description: With the summer ahead, it's time for new editions of music festival Effenaar 't Wasven. On Sunday, July 27th, you'll enjoy live music at Groendomein 't Wasven.

data.title: PSV - FC Eindhoven (Lichtstadderby)
data.short_description: The annual Lichtstadderby is back! Don't miss your chance to grab tickets for the thrilling PSV vs. FC Eindhoven game happening on Wednesday, July 30th!

data.title: Summer Art Club: our climate studio
data.short_description: What is your most beautiful nature memory? The climate workshop takes you on a creative adventure where your memories are transformed into artworks made from natural and recycled materials. Get your ticket!

data.title: Hello Eindhoven
data.short_description: Are you new in Eindhoven? Visit Hello Eindhoven at LAB-1, meet others, and get to know the city with a free guided tour! Don’t miss your chance—book your spot today!

data.title: Dagcollege Outdoor Festival
data.short_description: On Saturday, 2 August, Dagcollege Outdoor Festival returns to the Landsard Beach in Eindhoven. Get ready for an epic show, amazing artists, and the very best techno and house beats. Grab your ticket now!

data.title: Fevur
data.short_description: Fevur is the place where creative minds shine. They're continuing their journey at KEVN on August 2nd with a burst of live music, fashion, art, and photography. Don’t miss out—be there!

data.title: Summer Art Club: our climate studio
data.short_description: What is your most beautiful nature memory? The climate workshop takes you on a creative adventure where your memories are transformed into artworks made from natural and recycled materials. Get your ticket!

data.title: Grote Beek Pop
data.short_description: The upcoming festival marks the 13th edition of the music festival Grote Beek Pop. This friendly, free to visit, and alcohol-free festival will be once again on Landgoed De Grote Beek.

data.title: Unforgettable Van Abbe
data.short_description: A tour through the Van Abbemuseum for people with Alzheimer. Looking at art stimulates the brain, triggers memory, and helps create even more precious memories. Every second Monday of the month!

data.title: Summer Art Club: our climate studio
data.short_description: What is your most beautiful nature memory? The climate workshop takes you on a creative adventure where your memories are transformed into artworks made from natural and recycled materials. Get your ticket!

data.title: Summer Art Club: fashion
data.short_description: Give old clothes a new life at the Summer Art Club: Fashion! From tote bags to keychains and even your own bucket hat, anything is possible in this creative workshop for kids.

data.title: FeelGood Market
data.short_description: The FeelGood Market is a vibrant market full of design, fashion, vintage, delicious food and much more. Every third Sunday of the month at Strijp-S!

data.title: Burst Your Bubble
data.short_description: On Tuesday, 19 August, internationals and locals are welcome to connect and bridge the gap. Step out of your comfort zone and meet new people in Eindhoven. Sign up now!

data.title: Summer Art Club: fashion
data.short_description: Give old clothes a new life at the Summer Art Club: Fashion! From tote bags to keychains and even your own bucket hat, anything is possible in this creative workshop for kids.

data.title: Vintage Kilo Club
data.short_description: Ready to go on a thrifting adventure? Don’t miss out on the Vintage Kilo Club at The Social Hub Eindhoven!

data.title: Ankerfest
data.short_description: The loudest party of Eindhoven is back at Sectie-C! On Saturday, 23 August, the best Anker bands will climb the stage for some rock-solid music. Combine that with a beer, and Bob's your uncle!

data.title: Effenaar ’t Wasven
data.short_description: With the summer ahead, it's time for new editions of music festival Effenaar 't Wasven. On Sunday, August 24th, you can enjoy live music at Groendomein 't Wasven.

data.title: Summer Art Club: fashion
data.short_description: Give old clothes a new life at the Summer Art Club: Fashion! From tote bags to keychains and even your own bucket hat, anything is possible in this creative workshop for kids.

data.title: Hidden Garden Festival
data.short_description: Hidden Garden is back where it belongs! The green terrain of the IJzeren Man will be transformed into a beautiful outdoor dance Valhalla with only top-notch house music! Don't miss any new information.

data.title: Burst Your Bubble
data.short_description: On Monday, 1 September, internationals and locals are welcome to connect and bridge the gap. Step out of your comfort zone and meet new people in Eindhoven. Sign up now!

data.title: Bladi Festival
data.short_description: Experience Marrakesh for a day! On Saturday, September 6, Muziekgebouw Eindhoven will transform into a bustling souk (market), featuring authentic crafts, live performances, and traditional food and drinks.

data.title: Ride & Roast
data.short_description: Always dreamed of seeing the Big Five, but think Africa’s a bit too far? Hop on your bike in Eindhoven! On Saturday, 6 September, get a taste of the hills of Brabant during Ride & Roast Brabant.

data.title: Eindhoven Flea Market
data.short_description: Twice a year, IJssportcentrum Eindhoven turns into a true bargain paradise. On Sunday 7 September, you will find no fewer than 300 stalls full of second-hand treasures, vintage and curiosities!

data.title: Open Day Parktheater
data.short_description: Mark your calendars for the Open Day of Parktheater Eindhoven on Sunday, 7 September, which marks the start of the new theater season. Get a sneak peek of the brand-new shows for next season!

data.title: Unforgettable Van Abbe
data.short_description: A tour through the Van Abbemuseum for people with Alzheimer. Looking at art stimulates the brain, triggers memory, and helps create even more precious memories. Every second Monday of the month!

data.title: Burst Your Bubble
data.short_description: On Wednesday, 10 September, internationals and locals are welcome to connect and bridge the gap. Step out of your comfort zone and meet new people in Eindhoven. Sign up now!

data.title: Homewards The Welcome Evening
data.short_description: Want to get to know Eindhoven better and meet new people? Join Homewards! We’re kicking off the program on September 12 with The Welcome Evening. Hope to see you there!

data.title: Uit De Riolen van Eindhoven
data.short_description: Discover four local bands that share a passion for loud and raw metal music. Brace yourself for an energetic fusion of homegrown rock bands, including Vrøde and Embodiment of Sadism.

data.title: Liberation 040
data.short_description: Come together and celebrate the liberation of Eindhoven on Saturday, 13 September at the 18 Septemberplein! During this liberation festival, there are plenty of activities for all ages, inspiring speakers, and lots of music.

data.title: Finfonmarkt
data.short_description: The flea market around Sporthal Achtse Barrier takes place on Sunday September 14, from 10:00 to 17:00. Find books, dishes, or vintage items. Perhaps your treasure trove is waiting for you!

data.title: Ameezing
data.short_description: On Friday, September 19, the 25th Ameezing event will be held in Stadswandelpark at the Wim van Doorne Muziekkiosk. Come and sing your heart out to the best songs.

data.title: Vintage Kilo Club
data.short_description: Ready to go on a thrifting adventure? Don’t miss out on the Vintage Kilo Club at The Social Hub Eindhoven!

data.title: Whisky Event Eindhoven
data.short_description: Whether you're a curious novice or a seasoned whisky enthusiast, the Whisky Event Eindhoven on Saturday, September 20th, is the perfect opportunity to indulge your passion!

data.title: Flea market Tongelre
data.short_description: The flea market at Tongelre takes place on Sunday September 21, from 10:00 to 17:00. Find books, dishes, or vintage items at one of the many stalls. Perhaps your treasure trove is waiting for you!

data.title: Wasven Natuurlijk
data.short_description: Discover the green surroundings in and around the Wasven farm and immediately learn all about their sustainable contribution to the planet. That way, you can do the same!

data.title: FeelGood Market
data.short_description: The FeelGood Market is a vibrant market full of design, fashion, vintage, delicious food and much more. Every third Sunday of the month at Strijp-S!

data.title: STRIJP-Lol
data.short_description: On Friday evening, September 26, get ready to laugh out loud at the stand-up comedy show at the Blue Collar Café – featuring talented comedians from all around the world.

data.title: Vanstreek Festival
data.short_description: This year, another edition of the Vanstreek Festival will take place—a free and alcohol-free festival aimed at families with children. De Tuin at De Grote Beek Estate will once again be transformed into a festival ground with the theme 'What a Zoo'.

data.title: Popronde Eindhoven
data.short_description: Popronde Eindhoven is back! Free to join and with performances all throughout the city. Discover your favorite new act in your favorite pub, a tattoo shop, or "just" in the Altstadt.

data.title: No Barrier
data.short_description: No Barrier is the ultimate club night for pop punk, emo, metalcore, hardcore, rock, and more. Featuring DJ sets packed with guitar riffs, live pop punk hits, mosh pits, and gaming. Sing along to classics and the newest bangers!

data.title: Come As You Are
data.short_description: Three decades of guitar music will take the stage during Come As You Are, from the grunge of the early 1990s to the energetic punk of today. Make sure to be there on Saturday, 4 October!

data.title: Homewards The Workshop
data.short_description: Always wanted to discover Eindhoven’s hotspots? Or curious about the city’s hidden gems? Join Homewards The Workshop on October 4th and experience the city in a whole new way!

data.title: Americana Mondays
data.short_description: Enjoy authentic Americana with fabulous folk, blues, and country music. A local or international artist will enter the stage at M by Muziekgebouw Eindhoven every two weeks.

data.title: Unforgettable Van Abbe
data.short_description: A tour through the Van Abbemuseum for people with Alzheimer. Looking at art stimulates the brain, triggers memory, and helps create even more precious memories. Every second Monday of the month!

data.title: Losse Eindjes
data.short_description: Discover creative connections during Losse Eindjes, an open podium for spoken word that comes to life every two months in the creative hub of Kelderman and Van Noort.

data.title: FeelGood Market
data.short_description: The FeelGood Market is a vibrant market full of design, fashion, vintage, delicious food and much more. Every third Sunday of the month at Strijp-S!

data.title: Chit Chat Friday
data.short_description: Chit Chat Friday is the out-of-control after-work drink with your colleagues and friends! Next one? Friday, 24 October. As always, this edition promises to be a stunner!

data.title: Open day Fontys
data.short_description: Find the study program that suits you best at the Fontys open day. Already know what you want to study? Visit the Fontys open day and get to know all the different study programs.

data.title: Wasven Natuurlijk
data.short_description: Discover the green surroundings in and around the Wasven farm and immediately learn all about their sustainable contribution to the planet. That way, you can do the same!

data.title: Open day Summa
data.short_description: Find the study that suits you best at Summa College's open day. Do you already know what you want to study? Or do you have no idea yet? Meet all the different programs, teachers, and students.

data.title: BLUEPRINT
data.short_description: BLUEPRINT is landing in the city. On Saturday, November 8th, a spectacular indoor festival will take-off at Evoluon, full of euphoric house music. Make sure to be there!

data.title: Patroon Festival
data.short_description: Reach for the sky during Patroon Festival. On Saturday, November 15th, this rave will make the floor of skate park Area 51 shake with banging trance and acid music. Get your tickets today!

data.title: Helldorado Festival
data.short_description: Get ready for another loud ass festival. Get your tickets for Helldorado 2025 at Klokgebouw Eindhoven now!

data.title: Saint Nicholas arrives
data.short_description: On Saturday, 15 November, Saint Nicholas is coming to Eindhoven! Get ready for a day full of fun activities, and presents.

data.title: Homewards The Quiz
data.short_description: How well do you know Eindhoven? Find out at Homewards The Quiz on Sunday, November 16th. Rediscover the city and its people in a fun, unforgettable way—and you might just win some amazing prizes!

data.title: Merhaba Eindhoven
data.short_description: On Saturday, 22 November, you can dive into the Turkish culture with music, a vibrant bazaar, food and drinks, and endless fun for the kids. Don’t miss this cultural celebration!

data.title: Revolution Calling
data.short_description: Europe's biggest indoor hardcore punk festival is back at Klokgebouw Eindhoven! From the international top to not-to-miss upcoming artists. You do not want to miss this party!

data.title: Tributeland
data.short_description: The best Bee Gees and Muse tribute bands are fired up and ready to blow the roof off the Klokgebouw! Expect a rousing mix of everything from rock 'n' roll to pop and from '70s classics to disco anthems.

data.title: Urban Trail Eindhoven
data.short_description: Discover the city in the most sportive, exceptional way during the Urban Trail on Sunday, 30 November. It's getting cold, so keep running–you can do this!

data.title: Eindhoven Christmas Party
data.short_description: You don't want to miss this Christmas party! With artists such as Tino Martin and Joel Borelli, you'll be singing and dancing all night long in the Klokgebouw on Friday, 19 December!

data.title: Vroeg Pieken
data.short_description: Start your weekend on the dance floor during Vroeg Pieken at VIBES Eindhoven. Go wild to your favorite hits, request them and dance your legs off. You'll be in bed before you know it.

data.title: Memory Lane
data.short_description: Ready to relive the glory days of Hardstyle? On Saturday, December 20th, the ultimate Hardstyle classics event Memory Lane returns to Klokgebouw Eindhoven. Grab your tickets now!

data.title: Bonzai Classics Indoor
data.short_description: Bonzai Records is back at Vibes Eindhoven on Saturday, 24 January, and you can be there! Get your tickets, so you don't have to miss this unforgettable night.

data.title: Losse Eindjes
data.short_description: Discover creative connections during Losse Eindjes, an open podium for spoken word that comes to life every two months in the creative hub of Kelderman and Van Noort.

data.title: Bob Marley Tribute door Rootsriders ft Mo Ali
data.short_description: Reggae lovers, mark your calendars! On May 8th, Rootsriders celebrate their 20th anniversary at Effenaar. For two decades, they've paid tribute to Bob Marley, the king of reggae. From classics to original tracks, they've got it all. Grab your ticket!

data.title: Losse Eindjes
data.short_description: Discover creative connections during Losse Eindjes, an open podium for spoken word that comes to life every two months in the creative hub of Kelderman and Van Noort.

data.title: Losse Eindjes
data.short_description: Discover creative connections during Losse Eindjes, an open podium for spoken word that comes to life every two months in the creative hub of Kelderman and Van Noort.

data.title: Losse Eindjes
data.short_description: Discover creative connections during Losse Eindjes, an open podium for spoken word that comes to life every two months in the creative hub of Kelderman and Van Noort.

data.title: Alegria Festival
data.short_description: On July 12th and 13th, the Ketelhuisplein at Strijp-S will be transformed into a Latin and Caribbean paradise during the Alegria Festival! Two days entirely dedicated to South American culture, with food, music, and more.

data.title: Museum Kids Factory
data.short_description: Children learn more about technology through fun activities during Museum Kids Factory at the Philips Museum. Build mechanical artwork, unleash your creativity, or learn to draw in 3D.

data.title: Streetboard World Championship
data.short_description: On July 19th and 20th, the top streetboarders in the world will meet for one of the most significant contests in street culture. Drop by Area 51 for the 29th edition of Streetboard World Championship!

data.title: Park Hilaria 2025
data.short_description: From August 1 to 10, the Kennedylaan in Eindhoven will change into the temporary amusement park Park Hilaria.

data.title: ASML Summer Games
data.short_description: Get ready for a sporty summer at the ASML Summer Games. From soccer to freerunning, judo to athletics, and swimming, kids up to 13 years old can join in the fun for free!

data.title: Summer Camp Don Quishoot x YMCA
data.short_description: Enjoy three days of sports, games, and workshops at the Summer Camp at Don Quishoot. Children can fully express themselves and actively participate in various outdoor activities every day.

data.title: WEET IK VEEL! Festival
data.short_description: Anything from learning how to program, virtual reality, and sport skating to creating, building, or freerunning! This and much more are happening at WEET IK VEEL!

data.title: Otten Innovation Cup
data.short_description: From Memphis Depay to Harry Kane, these stars have played at the Otten Innovation Cup. Witness the future of football at the PSV youth tournament on August 15, 16, and 17.

data.title: Blue Square Festival
data.short_description: Make sure to save the date for an exceptional time at Wilhelminaplein. The Blue Square Festival is back on August 16th and 17th, showcasing a multitude of talented Eindhoven-based blues artists.

data.title: De Buurtcamping Eindhoven
data.short_description: Looking for a mini vacation close to home? Come to De Buurtcamping in Eindhoven! The Jacob Oppenheimerpark will be transformed into a cozy meeting place for three days full of fun activities.

data.title: Dynamo Metalfest
data.short_description: For their 10th edition, the Dynamo Metalfest is back at the IJssportcentrum Eindhoven from August 15th to 17th. Rock out to legendary metal artists like Within Temptation, Gojira, and many more. Get your tickets now!

data.title: Hydrographies
data.short_description: Water is everywhere—it gives us life, forms boundaries, and is sometimes even a weapon. At Hydrographies, artists come together to show how rivers, oceans, and underground water layers are important in the struggle for land, freedom, and survival.

data.title: Annual Medieval Market
data.short_description: The Medieval Market will take place on August 23 and 24 at the preHistorisch Dorp. Stroll past the cheese vendor at the market and discover a variety of goods in the houses, ranging from textiles to fine jewelry.

data.title: Intro Week TU/e
data.short_description: Hey, future TU/e student! Kick off your studies with a bang with an unforgettable intro week. Meet new friends, dive into campus life, and discover the city!

data.title: Purple Intro Week
data.short_description: Starting your new studies at Fontys in September? Before you dive into the books, it's party time! During Purple Intro Week, you will get ready for the fresh year.

data.title: Natlab Outdoor Cinema
data.short_description: One of Eindhoven's most beloved summer events is back: Natlab Outdoor Cinema. Grab your chair, round up your friends, order a drink, and get ready to enjoy the best films and blockbusters outdoors.

data.title: Het Wijn Festijn
data.short_description: On Friday, 29 August and Saturday, 30 August, The Netherlands' coziest wine festival is coming to the Anne Frankplantsoen in Eindhoven. Bring your friends and taste over 100 wines!
data.list_specific_location: Anne Frankplantsoen + Lex en Edo Hornemannplantsoen

data.title: Hit The City 2025
data.short_description: Hit the City is coming in hot with their summer edition, brand-new locations, upcoming artists and exciting new music!

data.title: Daan Rietbergen
data.short_description: Inspired by his graffiti background, Daan Rietbergen combines typography and architecture in public spaces. His work is characterized by sleek forms and structures that influence legibility. In public spaces, his creations come to life.

data.title: SHAWTY In Town Festival
data.short_description: The biggest SHAWTY outdoor festival hits Catharinaplein on September 6 and 7. With artists such as Jonna Fraser, Bizzey, and Idaly, you’ll be dancing to the hottest summer tracks all weekend long. Get your ticket now!

data.title: Open Monuments Day
data.short_description: Every year, majestic monuments throughout the Netherlands, including Eindhoven and its region, open their doors, inviting you to discover hidden gems you've never encountered before.

data.title: De Nacht van Strijp-S
data.short_description: Experience the full 24/7 Strijp-S sensation during De Nacht van Strijp-S. Mark your calendars for Saturday, September 20th, and Sunday, September 21st.

data.title: Emotional Motions
data.short_description: All summer long, you can visit the exhibition Emotional Motions at MU. It explores love, trauma, and a mix of themes like borderline, science, and pop culture. The artists behind this work want to show that, alongside discomfort and pain, you can also find joy and energy in vulnerability.

data.title: Solo exhibition Ima-Abasi Okon
data.short_description: In this exhibition, Ima-Abasi Okon shows how the idea of 'improvement' was once used to justify colonization. And guess what's surprising? We still see this same way of thinking today. This solo exhibition is a real eye-opener!

data.title: Fear of mirrors
data.short_description: How do we present ourselves in a digital world? That's the question artist Alba Zari asked herself. Through photography and experiments focused on women, she shows the influence of technology on our self-image. Ask yourself: does the digital world give us more freedom now, or are we still upholding old beauty ideals?

data.title: World Press Photo 2025
data.short_description:
The World Press Photo 2025 exhibition is coming back to the Atlas building on the TU/e campus. On display: the most powerful press photography from the past year.
Free entry—don't miss it!

data.title: Maker Days Eindhoven
data.short_description: Feel the magic of creation during the Maker Days Eindhoven. Discover the best and most fun creations, take part in workshops, and much more! In short: a visit will give you a flow of creative energy!

data.title: Atelier Tour Eindhoven and Region
data.short_description: Get ready for the unique opportunity to peek inside the workspaces of various designers and artists during the atelier tour. Discover everything from fine art and films to interactive installations and paintings.

data.title: European BMX Freestyle Championships
data.short_description: On October 3rd, 4th, and 5th, the European BMX Freestyle Championship will come to the Netherlands for the first time. During the event, Skatepark Area 51 and the Ketelhuisplein will set the stage for spectacular Urban Sports.

data.title: Lichtjesroute 2025
data.short_description: The lights are back in the streets again! That can only mean one thing: the Lichtjesroute (Route of Lights) is back in town from Thursday, September 18th to Sunday, October 12th.

data.title: Marathon Eindhoven
data.short_description: The second weekend of October is all about the Forty-first marathon in Eindhoven. Running not your jam? Cheer on the runners along the parcours!

data.title: Garden tour Van Abbe
data.short_description: Discover the largest artwork of the Van Abbemuseum: the garden designed by Piet Oudolf, around and even inside the museum. An exciting exploration for all ages!

data.title: GLOW Eindhoven
data.short_description: One of the highlights of the year: GLOW! From November 8th - 15th, Eindhoven will be all about stunning light art in the public space. Visit the festival for free!

data.title: Making food out of sunlight
data.short_description: In "The eye" of the Van Abbemuseum, you can see the free exhibition by Ketuta Alexi-Meskhishvili. In her work, which combines analog photography, dye-sublimation prints, and film, Ketuta Alexi-Meskhishvili invites us to reflect on the power of imagery in times of oppression.

data.title: Lazy Listeners Festival
data.short_description: On December 5th and 6th, you can enjoy an evening full of poetry, live music, literature, cabaret, theater, and more at Area51! You can leave your phone at home; just bring your attention.

data.title: Homecoming
data.short_description: What does "home" mean to you? The Homecoming exhibition centers around this question. Five artists with roots in Brabant share their personal responses, each from their own artistic discipline. They don't shy away from difficult conversations, offering powerful reflections on the meaning of home.

data.title: Eindhoven Metal Meeting
data.short_description: On Friday, December 12th, and Saturday, December 13th, Eindhoven’s loudest metal festival returns with a new edition at the Effenaar. You’ve been warned — the line-up is packed with big names!

data.title: BrAInpower
data.short_description: Curious about Artificial Intelligence? Dive into the world of AI's impact on our daily lives with the exhibition BrAInpower at the Philips Museum!

data.title: Impact through Design
data.short_description: A good design starts with one central question: what do people really need? During the Impact through Design exhibition, they show how design has played an essential role in the history of Philips. From smart innovations to timeless products, each design has contributed to a positive impact on daily life.

data.title: Art Eindhoven
data.short_description: More than 120 artists will display their work during Art Eindhoven on Saturday, 7 February, and Sunday, 8 February. Enjoy contemporary and classic art in the iconic Klokgebouw.

data.title: Winterclash
data.short_description: The battle of the titans erupts the weekend of 26 - 28 February at Area 51 skatepark. Get ready for spectacular tricks on skates from over 250 athletes from around the world.

data.title: The Art Department
data.short_description: The Klokgebouw Eindhoven will be transformed into one big Mecca for game, film, and animation lovers! During The Art Department, the two-day program is packed with tons of inspiration, creativity, and much more!

data.title: BRIDGE Guitar Festival
data.short_description: Starting May 27th, the guitar will take the stage for five days at the guitar festival BRIDGE! Everything will be performed, from classical to blues, jazz to rock, and flamenco to pop.

data.title: Verborgen Verbanden
data.short_description: The exhibition "Verborgen Verbanden" highlights the resistance and living conditions of plantation workers in Deli on Sumatra. With activities such as a captivating podcast and inspiring art projects, you gain a more comprehensive understanding of this overlooked subject.

data.title: NederTürk
data.short_description: At the NederTürk exhibition, you'll explore the Dutch-Turkish history in many different ways. Enjoy the dynamic works of young artists, join interactive workshops, and participate in special events. Discover stories, documentaries, photography, poetry, and much more.

data.title: Market Kastelenplein
data.short_description: The Kastelenplein Market is from 13.00 to 16.30 every Wednesday.

data.title: Market Winkelcentrum Woensel
data.short_description: The Market at Winkelcentrum Woensel is from 09.00 to 12.00 every Wednesday.

data.title: Wildeman Pubquiz
data.short_description: Every Tuesday and Wednesday promises to be a fun and lively evening at the pub quiz in Grandcafé de Wildeman! With various themed rounds and entertaining music rounds, there will be plenty of excitement and enjoyment. Gather your friends and join us for this challenging and entertaining quiz night!

data.title: Mission Eureka
data.short_description: Go on an adventure through the Philips Museum! Mission Eureka gives insights into Philips inventions that remain secret to other visitors ... Great fun for kids with parents, friends, or grandparents.

data.title: Language Café
data.short_description: The best way to master the Dutch language is by just doing it! Every Thursday, the Eindhoven library offers the opportunity to exercise. You are more than welcome!

data.title: Free Walking Tour
data.short_description: Experience an unforgettable tour of vibrant Eindhoven with a local. On this free, two-hour journey, you'll discover all the city's highlights, from Strijp-S to the Van Abbemuseum.

data.title: The Sweatshop
data.short_description: Bring your favorite garments to New Order of Fashion for a fresh refurbishment. Designers from Design Academy Eindhoven are ready to upcycle your items!

data.title: Market Sint Trudoplein
data.short_description: The Market at Sint Trudoplein is from 13.00 to 16.30 every Thursday.

data.title: Eindhoven International Quiz Night
data.short_description: The Eindhoven International Quiz Night is a fun weekly event, hosted in English, with questions about everything from London to Beijing and from Beethoven to Lady Gaga.

data.title: Market Winkelcentrum Haagdijk
data.short_description: The Market at Winkelcentrum Haagdijk is from 09.00 to 12.00 every Thursday.

data.title: Innovation Café
data.short_description: Every Thursday, Innovation Café treats its visitors to special guests, inspiring talks, interesting topics and debates. Think along about a sustainable living environment for ourselves and future generations, and contribute to the future of Eindhoven!

data.title: Feldenkrais Lesson
data.short_description: You'll experience the benefits and potential of body movement through a Feldenkrais workshop. Hook up with one of the weekly classes at Van Abbemuseum. Tip: wear something comfy.

data.title: Market Sint Gerardusplein
data.short_description: The Market at Sint Gerardusplein is from 12.00 to 16.30 every Friday.

data.title: MakersClub
data.short_description: Attention young mastermids! Build your own robot, learn all about electronics or get started with 3D printing. Come to the MakersClub workspace at Eindhoven Library.

data.title: Sustainable Weekly Market
data.short_description: Get your weekly dose of organic, fresh products at the Sustainable Weekly Market. Every Saturday at Wilhelminaplein.

data.title: Kids Art Club
data.short_description: There is an artist in every child. Are you between 6 and 12 years old? Come to the Van Abbemuseum and unleash your creativity during the weekly Kids Art Club!

data.title: Market at the Woenselse Markt
data.short_description: The Market at the Woenselse Markt is from 10.00 to 17.00 every Saturday.

data.title: City walk through Eindhoven
data.short_description: Discover the city center of Eindhoven with an experienced guide! Every Saturday at 11 AM.

data.title: Catharina Market
data.short_description: A market with a little bit of everything: vintage, good food, design and tech. Typical Eindhoven, and right in the middle of everything. Got your fix? Go to Stratumseind for a drink, or continue your shopping adventure in one of the nearby shopping streets.

data.title: Market Tarwelaan
data.short_description: The Tarwelaan Market is from 12.00 to 16.30 every Monday.

data.title: Pubquiz Stadscafé de Spijker
data.short_description: Kick off the week with Eindhoven's hottest pub quiz. Every Monday night, join the fun with your friends or colleagues! It's not about winning, right? Sign up with a maximum of 6 people!

data.title: Central Market (18 Septemberplein)
data.short_description: Stroll through this market with stands full of fresh veggies & fruit, flowers, bread, cheese, fabrics, and much more.
